meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alan Florendo Amanda Basta Bif Reiser Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7924.

td.p: Alan Florendo, a software developer from St. Louis, Missouri
Amanda Basta, an attorney from Arlington, Virginia
Bif Reiser, a mathematician from Portland, Oregon (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,001)

tr.td: MUSEUM MISCELLANY
EASY LISTENING
"P"LACES AT THE MALL
COUNTRY FACTS
MARCH ON!
WORD RHYMES
(Alex: Each correct response in that category will rhyme with the word "word".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Bif: What is hydroelectric?)
(Alan: What is wind?)

solar

BifAmandaAlan
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bif
Amanda
Alan
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Amanda] And Lu?)
(Amanda: Luke.)
(Alex: Did I get them all? Good.)
...
(Alan: She\'s a better mathematician.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: All right, yes. Can\'t add letters.)
...
(Alex: [To Bif] He was gonna write, "I haven\'t seen." Have never been in my kitchen or living room.)
AmandaWhat is are W + JFK? Hi Ellie Liv Anna + Lu
$3,199
AlanWhat are JFK + LBJ?
$1,000
BifWhat are 2 films I have
$0
W and JFK')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '3 presidential films, all directed by Oliver Stone, have a total of only 9 letters in their titles--"Nixon" & these 2')

tr.td: PRESIDENTS & THE MOVIES
3 presidential films, all directed by Oliver Stone, have a total of only 9 letters in their titles--"Nixon" & these 2
Bif
Amanda
Alan
2-day champion: $60,801
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Bif
Amanda
Alan

31 R
(including 3 DDs),
1 W

5 R,
1 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
